verses.verse: ( Boaz Redeems Ruth) וּבֹ֨עַז <WH1162> ū·ḇō·‘az Meanwhile, Boaz עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> ‘ā·lāh went הַשַּׁעַר֮ <WH8179> haš·ša·‘ar to the gate וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> way·yê·šeḇ and sat down שָׁם֒ <WH8033> šām there. וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> wə·hin·nêh Soon הַגֹּאֵ֤ל <WH1350> hag·gō·’êl the kinsman-redeemer ( The Hebrew word for kinsman-redeemer or guardian-redeemer is a legal term for the kinsman who redeems or vindicates a relative; also in verses 3, 6, 8, and 14; see .) עֹבֵר֙ <WH5674> ‘ō·ḇêr came along, אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> dib·ber- had spoken בֹּ֔עַז <WH1162> bō·‘az of whom [he] וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and Boaz said, ס֥וּרָה <WH5493> sū·rāh “ Come over שְׁבָה־ <WH3427> šə·ḇāh- and sit down. ” פֹּ֖ה <WH6311> pōh here, פְּלֹנִ֣י <WH6423> pə·lō·nî my friend אַלְמֹנִ֑י <WH492> ’al·mō·nî ..., וַיָּ֖סַר <WH5493> way·yā·sar So he went over וַיֵּשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> way·yê·šêḇ and sat down.

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> way·yiq·qaḥ Then Boaz took עֲשָׂרָ֧ה <WH6235> ‘ă·śā·rāh ten אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <WH582> ’ă·nā·šîm ... מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> miz·ziq·nê of the elders הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> hā·‘îr of the city וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and said, שְׁבוּ־ <WH3427> šə·ḇū- “ Sit פֹ֑ה <WH6311> p̄ōh here, ” וַיֵּשֵֽׁבוּ׃ <WH3427> way·yê·šê·ḇū and they did so.

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> way·yō·mer And he said לַגֹּאֵ֔ל <WH1350> lag·gō·’êl to the kinsman-redeemer, חֶלְקַת֙ <WH2513> ḥel·qaṯ the piece הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> haś·śā·ḏeh of land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that לְאָחִ֖ינוּ <WH251> lə·’ā·ḥî·nū belonged to our brother לֶאֱלִימֶ֑לֶךְ <WH458> le·’ĕ·lî·me·leḵ Elimelech. מָכְרָ֣ה <WH4376> mā·ḵə·rāh is selling נָעֳמִ֔י <WH5281> nā·‘o·mî “ Naomi, הַשָּׁ֖בָה <WH7725> haš·šā·ḇāh who has returned מִשְּׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> miś·śə·ḏêh from the land מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> mō·w·’āḇ of Moab,

וַאֲנִ֨י <WH589> wa·’ă·nî I אָמַ֜רְתִּי <WH559> ’ā·mar·tî thought אֶגְלֶ֧ה <WH1540> ’eḡ·leh I should inform אָזְנְךָ֣ <WH241> ’ā·zə·nə·ḵā you לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> lê·mōr that קְ֠נֵה <WH7069> qə·nêh you may buy it back נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> ne·ḡeḏ in the presence of הַֽיֹּשְׁבִים֮ <WH3427> hay·yō·šə·ḇîm those seated here וְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> wə·ne·ḡeḏ and in the presence of זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> ziq·nê the elders עַמִּי֒ <WH5971> ‘am·mî of my people. אִם־ <WH518> ’im- If תִּגְאַל֙ <WH1350> tiḡ·’al you want to redeem it, גְּאָ֔ל <WH1350> gə·’āl do so. וְאִם־ <WH518> wə·’im- But if you ( Many Hebrew manuscripts, LXX, Vulgate, and Syriac; most Hebrew manuscripts he) לֹ֨א <WH3808> lō will not יִגְאַ֜ל <WH1350> yiḡ·’al redeem [it], הַגִּ֣ידָה <WH5046> hag·gî·ḏāh tell לִּ֗י Prep│1cs ( lî) me וְאֵדַע 3045 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjImperf. Cohort-1cs ( wə·ʾē·ḏaʿ) so I may know, כִּ֣י 3588 Conj ( kî) because אֵ֤ין 369 Adv ( ’ên) [there is] no one זוּלָֽתְךָ֙ 2108 Prep│2ms ( zū·lā·ṯə·ḵā) but you לִגְא֔וֹל 1350 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( liḡ·’ō·wl) to redeem [it], וְאָנֹכִ֖י 595 Conj-w│Pro-1cs ( wə·’ā·nō·ḵî) and I [am] אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ 310 Prep│2ms ( ’a·ḥă·re·ḵā) next after you. ” וַיֹּ֖אמֶר 559 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yō·mer) he replied. אָנֹכִ֥י 595 Pro-1cs ( ’ā·nō·ḵî) “ I אֶגְאָֽל׃ 1350 V-Qal-Imperf-1cs ( ’eḡ·’āl) will redeem [it], ”

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said, בֹּ֔עַז <WH1162> bō·‘az Then Boaz בְּיוֹם־ <WH3117> bə·yō·wm- “ On the day קְנוֹתְךָ֥ <WH7069> qə·nō·wṯ·ḵā you buy הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> haś·śā·ḏeh the land מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> mî·yaḏ from נָעֳמִ֑י <WH5281> nā·‘o·mî Naomi וּ֠מֵאֵת <WH854> ū·mê·’êṯ and also from ר֣וּת <WH7327> rūṯ Ruth הַמּוֹאֲבִיָּ֤ה <WH4125> ham·mō·w·’ă·ḇî·yāh the Moabitess, אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> ’ê·šeṯ- the widow הַמֵּת֙ <WH4191> ham·mêṯ of the deceased קָנִיתִי <WH7069> qå̄·nī·ṯī you must also acquire לְהָקִ֥ים <WH6965> lə·hā·qîm in order to raise שֵׁם־ <WH8034> šêm- up the name הַמֵּ֖ת <WH4191> ham·mêṯ of the deceased עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5159> na·ḥă·lā·ṯōw his inheritance. ”

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer replied, הַגֹּאֵ֗ל <WH1350> hag·gō·’êl The kinsman-redeemer לֹ֤א <WH3808> lō “ I cannot אוּכַל֙ <WH3201> ’ū·ḵal ... לִגְאוֹל <WH1350> liḡ·ʾōl redeem it לִ֔י Prep│1cs myself, פֶּן־ 6435 Conj ( pen-) or אַשְׁחִ֖ית 7843 V-Hifil-Imperf-1cs ( ’aš·ḥîṯ) I would jeopardize אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - נַחֲלָתִ֑י 5159 N-fsc│1cs ( na·ḥă·lā·ṯî) my own inheritance. גְּאַל־ 1350 V-Qal-Imp-ms ( gə·’al-) ... לְךָ֤ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) ... אַתָּה֙ 859 Pro-2ms ( ’at·tāh) ... אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) -, גְּאֻלָּתִ֔י 1353 N-fsc│1cs ( gə·’ul·lā·ṯî) Take my right of redemption כִּ֥י 3588 Conj ( kî) because לֹא־ 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō-) I cannot אוּכַ֖ל 3201 V-Qal-Imperf-1cs ( ’ū·ḵal) ... לִגְאֹֽל׃ 1350 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( liḡ·’ōl) redeem it. ”

וְזֹאת֩ <WH2063> wə·zōṯ Now לְפָנִ֨ים <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·nîm in former times בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> bə·yiś·rā·’êl in Israel, עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- concerning הַגְּאוּלָּ֤ה <WH1353> hag·gə·’ūl·lāh the redemption וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- ... הַתְּמוּרָה֙ <WH8545> hat·tə·mū·rāh or exchange of property, לְקַיֵּ֣ם <WH6965> lə·qay·yêm legally binding כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- to make any דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> dā·ḇār matter שָׁלַ֥ף <WH8025> šā·lap̄ would remove אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> ’îš a man נַעֲל֖וֹ <WH5275> na·‘ă·lōw his sandal וְנָתַ֣ן <WH5414> wə·nā·ṯan and give it לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> lə·rê·‘ê·hū to the other party, וְזֹ֥את <WH2063> wə·zōṯ and this [was] הַתְּעוּדָ֖ה <WH8584> hat·tə·‘ū·ḏāh a confirmation בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> bə·yiś·rā·’êl in Israel.

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and said הַגֹּאֵ֛ל <WH1350> hag·gō·’êl So the kinsman-redeemer לְבֹ֖עַז <WH1162> lə·ḇō·‘az to Boaz, קְנֵה־ <WH7069> qə·nêh- “ Buy [it] לָ֑ךְ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) for yourself. ” וַיִּשְׁלֹ֖ף 8025 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yiš·lōp̄) removed נַעֲלֽוֹ׃ 5275 N-fsc│3ms ( na·‘ă·lōw) his sandal

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> way·yō·mer said בֹּ֨עַז <WH1162> bō·‘az At this, Boaz לַזְּקֵנִ֜ים <WH2205> laz·zə·qê·nîm to the elders וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl and all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām the people, עֵדִ֤ים <WH5707> ‘ê·ḏîm are witnesses אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> ’at·tem “ You הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> hay·yō·wm today כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî that קָנִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7069> qā·nî·ṯî I am buying אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that לֶֽאֱלִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH458> le·’ĕ·lî·me·leḵ belonged to Elimelech, וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> wə·’êṯ - כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- - אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - לְכִלְי֖וֹן <WH3630> lə·ḵil·yō·wn Chilion, וּמַחְל֑וֹן <WH4248> ū·maḥ·lō·wn and Mahlon. מִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> mî·yaḏ from נָעֳמִֽי׃ <WH5281> nā·‘o·mî Naomi

וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> wə·ḡam Moreover אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- -, ר֣וּת <WH7327> rūṯ Ruth הַמֹּאֲבִיָּה֩ <WH4125> ham·mō·’ă·ḇî·yāh the Moabitess, אֵ֨שֶׁת <WH802> ’ê·šeṯ widow, מַחְל֜וֹן <WH4248> maḥ·lō·wn Mahlon’s קָנִ֧יתִי <WH7069> qā·nî·ṯî I have acquired לִ֣י Prep│1cs ( lî) ... לְאִשָּׁ֗ה 802 Prep-l│N-fs ( lə·’iš·šāh) as my wife, לְהָקִ֤ים 6965 Prep-l│V-Hifil-Inf ( lə·hā·qîm) to raise up שֵׁם־ 8034 N-msc ( šêm-) the name הַמֵּת֙ 4191 Art│V-Qal-Prtcpl-ms ( ham·mêṯ) of the deceased עַל־ 5921 Prep ( ‘al-) through נַ֣חֲלָת֔וֹ 5159 N-fsc│3ms ( na·ḥă·lā·ṯōw) his inheritance, וְלֹא־ 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō-) will not יִכָּרֵ֧ת 3772 V-Nifal-Imperf-3ms ( yik·kā·rêṯ) disappear שֵׁם־ 8034 N-msc ( šêm-) name הַמֵּ֛ת 4191 Art│V-Qal-Prtcpl-ms ( ham·mêṯ) so that his מֵעִ֥ם 5973 Prep-m ( mê·‘im) from among אֶחָ֖יו 251 N-mpc│3ms ( ’e·ḥāw) his brothers וּמִשַּׁ֣עַר 8179 Conj-w, Prep-m│N-msc ( ū·miš·ša·‘ar) or from the gate מְקוֹמ֑וֹ 4725 N-msc│3ms ( mə·qō·w·mōw) of his home. עֵדִ֥ים 5707 N-mp ( ‘ê·ḏîm) are witnesses today אַתֶּ֖ם 859 Pro-2mp ( ’at·tem) You הַיּֽוֹם׃ 3117 Art│N-ms ( hay·yō·wm) .... ”

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <WH559> way·yō·mə·rū said כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- and all הָעָ֧ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - בַּשַּׁ֛עַר <WH8179> baš·ša·‘ar at the gate. וְהַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <WH2205> wə·haz·zə·qê·nîm the elders עֵדִ֑ים <WH5707> ‘ê·ḏîm “ We are witnesses, ” יִתֵּן֩ <WH5414> yit·tên make יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yah·weh “ May the LORD אֶֽת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָאִשָּׁ֜ה <WH802> hā·’iš·šāh the woman הַבָּאָ֣ה <WH935> hab·bā·’āh entering אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... בֵּיתֶ֗ךָ <WH1004> bê·ṯe·ḵā your home כְּרָחֵ֤ל׀ <WH7354> kə·rā·ḥêl like Rachel וּכְלֵאָה֙ <WH3812> ū·ḵə·lê·’āh and Leah, אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer who בָּנ֤וּ <WH1129> bā·nū together built up שְׁתֵּיהֶם֙ <WH8147> šə·tê·hem ... אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> bêṯ the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel. וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> wa·‘ă·śêh- May you be חַ֣יִל <WH2428> ḥa·yil prosperous בְּאֶפְרָ֔תָה <WH672> bə·’ep̄·rā·ṯāh in Ephrathah וּקְרָא־ <WH7121> ū·qə·rā- and famous שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> šêm ... בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1035> bə·ḇêṯ in לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> lā·ḥem Bethlehem.

וִיהִ֤י <WH1961> wî·hî become בֵֽיתְךָ֙ <WH1004> ḇê·ṯə·ḵā And may your house כְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> kə·ḇêṯ like the house פֶּ֔רֶץ <WH6557> pe·reṣ of Perez, אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- whom יָלְדָ֥ה <WH3205> yā·lə·ḏāh bore תָמָ֖ר <WH8559> ṯā·mār Tamar לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> lî·hū·ḏāh to Judah, מִן־ <WH4480> min- because of הַזֶּ֗רַע <WH2233> haz·ze·ra‘ the offspring אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> yit·tên will give יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD לְךָ֔ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) you מִן־ 4480 Prep ( min-) by הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה 5291 Art│N-fs ( han·na·‘ă·rāh) young woman. ” הַזֹּֽאת׃ 2063 Art│Pro-fs ( haz·zōṯ) this
